resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104784</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104784</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205633</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Good medicine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gute Medizin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bonne médecine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medicina boa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Buona medicina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλή ιατρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Buena medicina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will examine changes in technology, medicine, and health that took place in North Carolina between 1870 and 1930 and construct products and ideas which demonstrate understanding of how these changes impacted people living in To achieve these goals, students will employ the eight intelligences of Howard Gardner's Multiple Intelligences Theory.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer überprüfen Änderungen in der 
Technologie, Medizin, und Gesundheit, die in Nord-Carolina zwischen 
1870 und 1930 und Konstruierenprodukte und -ideen stattfand, die 
Verständnis zeigen von, wie diese Änderungen die Leute auswirkten, 
die innen leben, um diese Ziele zu erzielen, Kursteilnehmer setzt die 
acht Intelligenzen Howard Gardners der mehrfachen Intelligenz-Theorie 
ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants examineront des changements de 
technologie, médecine, et la santé qui a eu lieu en Caroline 
du nord entre 1870 et 1930 et produits et idées de construction 
qui démontrent l'arrangement de la façon dont ces changements ont 
effectué des personnes vivant dedans pour réaliser ces buts, 
étudiants utilisera les huit intelligences de la théorie multiple 
d'intelligences de Howard Gardner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes examinarão mudanças na tecnologia,
medicina, e a saúde que ocorreu em North.carolina entre 1870 e 1930 e
produtos e idéias da construção que demonstram a compreensão de 
como estas mudanças impactaram os povos que vivem dentro para 
conseguir estes objetivos, estudantes empregará as oito 
inteligências da teoria múltipla das inteligências de Howard 
Gardner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi esamineranno i cambiamenti nella 
tecnologia, la medicina e la salute che ha avvenuto in North.carolina 
fra 1870 e 1930 e prodotti ed idee della costruzione che dimostrano la
comprensione di come questi cambiamenti hanno avuto effetto sulla 
gente che vive dentro per realizzare questi obiettivi, allievi 
impiegherà le otto intelligenze della teoria multipla di intelligenze
di Howard Gardner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν τις αλλαγές στην 
τεχνολογία, την ιατρική, και την υγεία που πραγματοποιήθηκαν στη 
βόρεια Καρολίνα μεταξύ 1870 και 1930 και τα προϊόντα και 
τις ιδέες κατασκευάσματος που καταδεικνύουν την κατανόηση για το 
πώς αυτά τα επηρεασμένα αλλαγές άτομα που ζουν μέσα για να 
επιτύχουν αυτούς τους στόχους, σπουδαστές θα υιοθετήσουν τα οκτώ
intelligences της πολλαπλάσιας θεωρίας Intelligences του 
Howard Gardner's.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes examinarán cambios en la 
tecnología, medicina, y la salud que ocurrió en Carolina del Norte 
entre 1870 y 1930 y los productos y las ideas de la construcción que 
demuestran la comprensión de cómo estos cambios afectaron a gente 
que vivía adentro para alcanzar estas metas, estudiantes empleará 
las ocho inteligencias de la teoría múltiple de las inteligencias de
Howard Gardner.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
